SELECT COUNT(dvs.DDJRQ) as totalNum,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates
toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ))+1 as dates
toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates
toQuarter(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates
toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.DDJRQ)) as dates
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH, dvs.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) in (select dvs1.CJSDBH, max(dvs1.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs1
and dvs1.DDJRQ BETWEEN #{params.startTime}and #{params.endTime}
and dvs1.CQWH = #{params.cqwh}
and dvs1.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm}
group by dvs1.CJSDBH )
group by dates,groupName

SELECT COUNT(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME) as totalNum,
dvs.CUSTOMER_NAME as groupName,
dvs.BASE_NAME as groupName,
toDate(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME))+1 as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toQuarter(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates, toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as yearOfDates
toYear(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH, dvs.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) in (select dvs1.CJSDBH, max(dvs1.WAREHOUSE_CREATETIME) from dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs1
and dvs1.SHIPMENT_TIME BETWEEN #{params.startTime}and #{params.endTime}
and dvs1.CQWH = #{params.cqwh}
and dvs1.CZJGSDM = #{params.czjgsdm}
group by dvs1.CJSDBH )
group by dates ,groupName
, yearOfDates

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) as totalNum , dates FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT dvs2.CJSDBH,MAX(dvs2.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs2
AND dvs2.SHIPMENT_TIME != 0L
AND dvs2.SHIPMENT_TIME BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
AND dvs2.CQWH = #{cqwh}
AND dvs2.CZJGSDM = #{czjgsdm}
GROUP BY dvs2.CJSDBH )
GROUP BY Date(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY toWeek(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
ORDER BY totalNum DESC

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) as totalNum , dates FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT dvs2.CJSDBH,MAX(dvs2.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs2

GROUP BY toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.THEORY_OUT_TIME)) as dates
ORDER BY totalNum DESC

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) as totalNum , dates FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT dvs2.CJSDBH,MAX(dvs2.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs2
AND dvs2.SHIPMENT_TIME >= #{startTime}

GROUP BY toMonth(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY QUARTER(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
GROUP BY YEAR(fromUnixTimestamp64Milli(dvs.SHIPMENT_TIME)) as dates
ORDER BY totalNum DESC

SELECT count(dvs.CJSDBH) as totalNum , dates FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs
(dvs.CJSDBH,dvs.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) IN ( SELECT dvs2.CJSDBH,MAX(dvs2.WAREHOUSE_UPDATETIME) FROM dwm_vlms_sptb02 dvs2
